establishment.address: Shop 4, Radha Palace, Opposite Imperial Mall, Star Bazzar, Adajan Gam, Surat

items.name: Chicken Soup
items.description: Chicken soup prepared from pure chicken stew tossed with green chilli, garlic, ginger, coriander, pink salt, chat masala. Its an pure chicken soup like desi home style [no food color, no vinegar, no corn starch used in making].

items.name: Chicken Pepper Soup
items.description: Chicken soup prepared from pure chicken stew tossed with green chilli, garlic, ginger, coriander, pink salt, black pepper. Its an pure chicken soup like desi home style [no food colour, no vinegar, no corn starch used in making].

items.name: Chicken Gavthi Sukka
items.description: Chicken coated with some authentic & traditional Maharashtrian spices tossed in kadhai with chef’s special secret base. Smooth outside juicy inside, its a must try dish if you like desi style dry chicken.

items.name: Chicken Bhuna Dry
items.description: Bhuna is the most loved preparation from us. This chicken bhuna is so aromatic that it would make you fall in love with it. Combination of various spice’s along with chef’s special base is just perfect in this dish.

items.name: Chicken Konkani Sukka
items.description: Konkan is a region of Maharashtra famous for its non veg food, this konkani sukha chicken is prepared with hand picked konkani spices tossed with coconut in base gravy. It will give you true konkani taste to your taste buds.

items.name: Aagri-Koli Chicken Sukha
items.description: Aagri koli, the first citizens of currently known as Mumbai city. This chicken is prepared with the very authentic aagri koli masala, a regional spice blend originated from the vibrant kitchens of the aagri & koli communities. Being a community that borders the coastal line, influence of coconut in the food is very natural and therefore roasted coconut is used in this dish.

items.name: Chicken Kadhai Sukka
items.description: Juicy soft & fresh chicken tossed with chef's special spice mixed in kadhai. Tossed till it flovour smokey.

items.name: Chicken Malvani Sukka
items.description: Malvani sukka is a masaledar chicken with a dense paste and bursting with coconut flavor. Malvani cuisine comes from the konkan region of maharashtra and goa. Tossed with malvani spice's in kadhai.

items.name: Chicken Daman Style Dry
items.description: Juicy chicken cooked with spices and herbs in a traditional daman and diu style.

items.name: Pomfret Fish Tawa Fry
items.description: The Konkani style pomfret fry is a tasty and spicy appetizer that you should must try. The sliver white pomfret is marinated well using a freshly ground konkani masala, dipped into rava and is pan roasted on a tawa till it is charred well. You can have the fried pomfret along with a flavourful fish curry and steamed rice by the side.

items.name: Jhinga Fry
items.description: Fresh prawns marinated with authentic hand picked spices from Konkan region of Maharashtra famous for its seafood cuisine pan roasted on a tawa till it is charred well. You can have the fry prawns along with a flavourful prawns curry and steamed rice by the side.

items.name: Prawns Tawa Fry
items.description: Fresh prawns marinated with authentic hand picked spices from Konkan region of Maharashtra famous for its seafood cuisine pan roasted on a tawa till it is charred well. You can have the fry prawns along with a flavourful prawns curry and steamed rice by the side.

items.name: Jhinga Bhuna Kadai Fry
items.description: Bhuna is the most loved preparation from us. This jhinga bhuna fry is so aromatic that it would make you fall in love with it. Combination of various spice’s along with chef’s special base is just perfect in this dish.

items.name: Fish Tawa Fry
items.description: Fresh sea water fish marinated with special Konkan region spices mixed which is famous and known for its seafood coated with rava fried on tawa till it looks dark brown crispy outside juicy and soft inside. Drizzle it with lemon enjoy with fish curry and rice.

items.name: Mutton Gavthi Sukha
items.description: The heart of this dish is the exotic Maharashtrian spices tossed with the chef’s special base along with perfectly cooked soft & juicy mutton pieces. Its an mouth watering dish and one of the most liked dish from us, cooked till perfection. Can be eaten in its own as an appetizer or starter or goes well with rice too.

items.name: Mutton Bhuna Dry
items.description: Bhuna is the most loved preparation from us. This mutton bhuna is so aromatic that it would make you fall in love with it. Combination of various spices along with chef’s special base is just perfect in this dish. Drizzle it with lemon & enjoy it.

items.name: Mutton Kharda Sukka
items.description: Kharda or thecha chutney is a famous Maharashtrian preparation which is the heart of this dish. Perfectly cooked mutton pieces sauteed in base along with green chilly, garlic, ginger & some chef’s special spices topped with some fresh parsley which makes the dish lip smacking that promises to set your taste buds ablaze.

items.name: Mutton Kadhai Sukka
items.description: Juicy soft & fresh mutton tossed with chef's special spice mixed in kadhai. Tossed till it flavor smokey.

items.name: Gavthi Egg Fry [3 Eggs]
items.description: A delicious combination of eggs and vegetables, perfect for a hearty breakfast or a satisfying snack.

items.name: Egg Bhuna Fry [3 Eggs]
items.description: A delicious egg dish, prepared in a rich, flavorful, aromatic bhuna gravy with the perfect blend of spices.

items.name: Egg Kadhai Fry [3 Eggs]
items.description: A rich and creamy egg curry with a hint of spice, this dish is sure to please.

items.name: Egg Malwani Fry [3 Eggs]
items.description: A flavourful dish that is made with the delicious combination of eggs, spices and aromatic herbs.

items.description:
Half - 1 Egg Grated + 2 Eggs Cut Piece.
Full  - 1 Egg Grated + 4 Eggs Cut Piece.

items.name: Egg kolhapuri
items.description:

Full  - 1 Egg Grated + 4 Eggs Cut Piece.

items.name: Egg Bhuna Masala
items.description: A spicy and flavorful egg dish, perfect for a hearty meal. Savory, aromatic, and satisfying.

items.name: Konkani Egg Masala
items.description:
Half - 1 Egg Grated + 2 Eggs Cut Piece.
Full  - 1 Egg Grated + 4 Eggs Cut Piece.

items.name: Egg Kadhai Masala
items.description:
Half - 1 Egg Grated + 2 Eggs Cut Piece.
Full  - 1 Egg Grated + 4 Eggs Cut Piece.

items.name: Konkani Egg Handi
items.description:
Half - 1 Egg Grated + 2 Eggs Cut Piece.
Full  - 1 Egg Grated + 4 Eggs Cut Piece.

items.name: Agri Egg Masala
items.description:
Half - 1 Egg Grated + 2 Eggs Cut Piece.
Full  - 1 Egg Grated + 4 Eggs Cut Piece.

items.name: Malvani Egg Masala
items.description:
Half - 1 Egg Grated + 2 Eggs Cut Piece.
Full  - 1 Egg Grated + 4 Eggs Cut Piece.

items.name: Maharashtrian Chicken Gavthi Handi
items.description: Cooked slowly in an authentic marathi way with traditional spices which gives your tastebuds the true & real taste of Maharashtra. This rules the list of Maharashtrian chicken cuisine called as chicken gavthi handi known for its patla tambda rassa [curry]. It is the most commonly cooked dish in the region of Maharashtra yet most famous & tasty. Top layer of tarri [tavang] & coconut in its base is the is the speciality of this dish. Best with steamed rice or rice bhakri.

items.name: Chicken Kolhapuri Masala
items.description: It is prepared with hand picked special regional spice blend from Kolhapur region of Maharashtra. The gravy is super smooth which makes it very delicious & topped with some fresh parsley which makes the dish lip smacking that promises to set your taste buds ablaze.

items.name: Konkani Chicken Handi
items.description: Konkani curry is cooked with with hand picked konkani spices the identity of western India. It is loved for its patla rassa [thin curry]. Konkan is a region of Maharashtra famous for its non veg food, best with butter chapati along with lemon onion salad.

items.name: Konkani Chicken Masala
items.description: Konkan is a region of Maharashtra famous for its non veg food. This thick gravy konkani masala chicken is prepared with the blend of hand picked konkani spices tossed with coconut in base gravy. It will give true konkani taste to your taste buds. Slowly cooked on low flame till perfection.

items.name: Chicken Bhuna Masala
items.description: Bhuna is the most loved preparation from us. This chicken bhuna is so aromatic that it would make you fall in love with it. Combination of various spice’s along with chef’s special base is just perfect in this dish. The rich texture of this bhuna masala gravy will make you fall in love with it.

items.name: Chicken Malvani Masala
items.description: This is a masaledar chicken with thick gravy bursting with coconut flavor. Malvani cuisine comes from the konkan region of Maharashtra and Goa. Tossed with malvani spice's in kadhai. Its smooth gravy makes this dish super delicious. Goes perfect when paired with the special millet flour roti such as rice roti or jowar roti.

items.name: Kadhai Chicken Masala
items.description: Chicken gravy made out of chefs special kadhai masala mix spice blend along with soft & fresh chicken pieces into the kadhai it self. It just taste soo good when had with simple chapati or with jeera rice

items.name: Chicken Agri Masala
items.description: Aagri koli, the first citizens of currently known as Mumbai city. This chicken is prepared with the very authentic aagri koli masala, a regional spice blend originated from the vibrant kitchens of the aagri & koli communities. Being a community that borders the coastal line, influence of coconut in the food is very natural and therefore roasted coconut is used in this dish. It is loved for its spiciness. Best with Butter chapati along with a lemon onion salad.

items.name: Prawns Masala
items.description: Prawns cooked in a traditional konkani coconut masala. The gravy has the right amount of sourness which you can enjoy along with steamed rice and solkadhi for a perfect and delicious meal.

items.name: Jhinga Masala
items.description: Prawns cooked in a traditional konkani coconut masala. The gravy has the right amount of sourness which you can enjoy along with steamed rice and solkadhi for a perfect and delicious meal.

items.name: Gavthi Mutton Handi
items.description: Cooked slowly in an authentic marathi way with traditional spices which gives your tastebuds the true & real taste of Maharashtra. This rules the list of Maharashtrian mutton cuisine called as mutton gavthi handi known for its patla tambda rassa [curry]. It is the most commonly cooked dish in the region of Maharashtra yet most famous & tasty. Top layer of tarri [tavang] & coconut in its base is the is the speciality of this dish. Best with steamed rice or rice bhakri.

items.name: Mutton Kolhapuri Masala
items.description: Its a thick gravy mutton dish from BCT, which is loved by most of the people. It is prepared with hand picked special regional spice blend from kolhapur region of maharashtra. The gravy is super smooth which makes it very delicious & topped with some fresh parsley which makes the dish lip smacking that promises to set your taste buds ablaze.

items.name: Mutton Bhuna Masala
items.description: Bhuna is the most loved preparation from us. This mutton bhuna is so aromatic that it would make you fall in love with it. Combination of various spices along with chef’s special base is just perfect in this dish. The rich texture of this bhuna masala gravy on soft & juicy mutton pieces will make you fall in love with it.

items.name: Konkani Mutton Masala
items.description: Mutton Konkani masala cooked with juicy mutton [goat meat] & Konkan region spices the identity of Western India. It is loved for its smooth gravy, prepared in a true Konkani way. Enjoy it with rice flour rotla or steamed rice along with lemon onion salad.

items.name: Mutton Hara Kolhapuri
items.description: [Medium Spicy] Mutton green gravy made in traditional style, spiced with exotic green chilli and chefs special blend of various Maharashtrian spices. Its smooth & naturally creamy gravy makes it very delicious as well as mouth watering.[No food colour &  No Cream is used in the food.]

items.name: Solapuri Mutton Kala Masala
items.description: This dish derives its taste from the kala or the black masala. Kala masala is a special blend of roasted spices and coconut which gives this dish a unique flavour and a dark brownish colour.

items.name: Konkani Mutton Handi
items.description: Mutton Konkani curry cooked with juicy mutton [goat meat] & Konkan region spices the identity of Western India. It is loved for its thin curry [rassa]. Prepared in a true Konkani way. Best with butter chapati along with lemon onion salad.

items.name: Rice Flour Rotla [Bhakri]
items.description: These super soft, healthy and delicious! Rice flour rotis, aka Chawal Atta Chapatis are made from mainly rice flour and water, perfect gluten free, vegan, plant based flat beard.This are very popular in Indian community. These rotis taste amazing with any type of Non Veg curries, dal, sabji, raita, achar etc.

items.name: Plain Chapati
items.description: Plain chapati or chapati is a flat bread made from wheat flour [atta].

items.name: Butter Chapati
items.description: Plain chapati or chapati is a flat bread made from wheat flour [atta], layered with butter.

items.name: Plain Rice
items.description: Plain rice is a traditional Indian dish made with royal basmati long grain white boiled rice.

items.name: Jeera Rice
items.description: Cumin flavoured rice also known as jeera rice. It is usually made using rice and cumin seeds seasoning added. You can have this with any side dish, usually goes well with chicken curries. Since it is very mild in flavour it taste yummy with spicy curries.

items.name: Chicken Bhuna Biryani
items.description: Long grain steamed royal basmati rice tossed in pan with chef’s special bhuna masala along with soft & juicy biryani cut pieces of chicken. The balanced blend of various spices makes it so aromatic & delicious that one just can't forgot its taste & topped with some fresh parsley which makes the dish lip smacking that promises to set your taste buds ablaze.

items.name: Bombay Chicken Biryani
items.description: An aromatic and flavorful biryani made with tender chicken, basmati rice, and aromatic spices.

items.name: Jhinga Biryani
items.description: Prawn biryani is popular as jhinga biryani in India. Spicy shrimp masala full of juice, moist and tasty tossed in pan with fragrant basmati rice, slow cooked to perfection, divine. The taste of this prawns biryani will linger on your taste buds so much so that it will straight away enter in your weekly menu list. Truly a treat for all seafood lovers, a dish that will make you ask for more and more.

items.name: Fish Tikka Biryani
items.description: Fish tikka biryani is a wholesome combination of boiled rice and tawa fried fish tikka which are prepared with the amalgamation of spices. You can have it as a main dish either for lunch or dinner. You are absolutely wrong if you think biryani can only be made with mutton or chicken. This becomes your favorite dish once you tried it. It is mouthwatering meal. It is also a whole package of nutrients. If you are a seafood lover then it’s a must try dish for you.

items.name: Egg Biryani
items.description: Egg biryani is among one of the most special preparation from BCT. Fresh boiled eggs cooked In hot special bhuna masala in pan along with authentic & true Bombay style spice blend is the heart of the dish. Small pieces of chopped eggs with every bite of biryani is what make you fall in love with it. Rich in taste, juice as well tasty its an whole treat in itself.

items.name: Egg Bhuna Rice
items.description: Specially for egg lovers Long Grain steamed Royal Basmati Rice tossed in pan with chef’s special Bhuna Masala along with soft & juicy boiled eggs cut into pieces. The balanced blend of various spices makes it so aromatic & delicious that one just cant forgot its taste. & Topped With Some Fresh Parsley Which Makes The Dish Lip Smacking That Promises To Set Your Taste Buds Ablaze.

items.name: Maharashtrian Chicken Thali [Regular]
items.description: Chicken Gavthi Handi [Patla Tambda Gavran Rassa]+3 Chapati+Rice [1 Bowl]+Onion Lemon Salad

items.name: Special Maharashtrian Chicken Thali
items.description: Chicken Gavthi Handi [Patla Tambda Gavran Rassa]+Chicken Kolhapuri Sukka Dry+3 Chapati+Rice [1 Bowl]+Onion Lemon Salad

items.name: Express Maharashtrian Chicken Thali

items.name: Junction Maharashtrian Chicken Thali
items.description: Chicken Gavthi Handi [Patla Tambda Gavran Rassa]+Chicken Kolhapuri Sukka Dry+Chicken Bhuna Sukka Dry+Aalni Chicken Soup+3 Chapati+Rice [1 Bowl]+Onion Lemon Salad

items.name: Maharashtrian Mutton Thali [Regular]

items.name: Special Maharashtrian Mutton Thali

items.name: Express Maharashtrian Mutton Thali

items.name: Maharashtrian Konkan [Regular] Fish Thali [Small]

items.name: Maharashtrian Konkan Special Fish Thali [Small]
items.description: Fish Gravy [1 Pc]+Fish Tawa Fry [1 Pc]+3 Chapati+ Rice +Salad

items.name: Maharashtrian Konkan Seafood Thali Number 1 [Small]
items.description: [1 Pc Fish Gravy + 1 Pc Fish Tawa Fry + 5 Pc Prawns Tawa Fry + 3 Chapati + Rice + Salad]

items.name: Maharashtrian Konkan Seafood Thali Number 2 [Small]
items.description: Prawns Gravy [5 Pc]+ Fish Tawa Fry [1 Pc]+ Prawns Tawa Fry [5 Pc] +3 Chapati + Rice + Salad

items.name: Maharashtrian Konkan Prawns Thali [Small]
items.description: Prawns Gravy [5 Pc]+ Prawns Tawa Fry [5 Pc]+ 3 Chapati+ Rice +Salad

items.name: Maharashtrian Konkan Special Fish Thali [Large]

items.description: Prawns Gravy [5 Pc]+Prawns Tawa Fry [10 Pc]+3 Chapati+ Rice +Salad

items.description: Bhuna is the most loved preparation from us. This chicken bhuna is so aromatic that it would make you fall in love with it. Combination of various spice’s along with chef’s special base is just perfect in this dish. The rich texture of this bhuna masala gravy will make you fall in love with it.

items.name: Konkani Chicken Handi
items.description: Konkani curry is cooked with with hand picked konkani spices the identity of western India. It is loved for its patla rassa [thin curry]. Konkan is a region of Maharashtra famous for its non veg food, best with butter chapati along with lemon onion salad.
